text:
@GOPLeader @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis Saying Positive rates are down is disingenuous at best. Look at the seven day average change from the beginning of June. Then ook at each state. NV has small raw numbers but we had 26% positive rate on Friday. Hospitalizations are the highest so far. 
https://t.co/6HiHQw3Kd2
